p: The research protocol was implemented with the approval of the Vice-Presidency of Agriculture, Fisheries and Environment of the Union of Comoros. No endangered or protected species were involved in the survey. Farmers in each zone gave their verbal consent to be included in the study. Permissions for the blood sample collection were obtained. The animals were bled without suffering. Regarding the trade survey, no personal data were collected, and only information concerning the number of animals travelling from one island to another was taken into account.
